biocontainers.name: slncky
biocontainers.summary: Slncky is a tool for lncrna discovery from rna-seq data. slncky filters a high-quality set of noncoding transcripts, discovers lncrna orthologs, and characterizes conserved lncrna evolution. slncky was developed as a collaboration between the garber lab at umass medical and the regev lab at the broad institute.

biotools.summary: Filters a high-quality set of lncRNA from reconstructed RNA-seq data and searches for conserved lncRNAs using a sensitive noncoding aligning method.

bioschemas.name: slncky
bioschemas.summary: Filters a high-quality set of lncRNA from reconstructed RNA-seq data and searches for conserved lncRNAs using a sensitive noncoding aligning method.
